videoobject.name: The Last Stretch to Sweden
videoobject.caption: A group of migrants, who were aiming to go to Sweden but were being detained by the police in Denmark, defiantly marched on.
videoobject.description: A group of migrants, who were aiming to go to Sweden but were being detained by the police in Denmark, defiantly marched on.

videoobject.name: Another Unexpected Stop
videoobject.caption: A train carrying a large group of migrants to Sweden came to an abrupt stop in Denmark, where the police asked everyone to disembark.
videoobject.description: A train carrying a large group of migrants to Sweden came to an abrupt stop in Denmark, where the police asked everyone to disembark.

videoobject.name: The Train to Germany
videoobject.caption: Syrian migrants took a train from Austria to their final destination: Germany.
videoobject.description: Syrian migrants took a train from Austria to their final destination: Germany.

videoobject.name: The Hookah Affair
videoobject.caption: A Kurdish migrant takes momentary refuge in the familiar taste of a hookah, which he has carried for weeks while traveling on the precarious trail from Greece to Hungary.
videoobject.description: A Kurdish migrant takes momentary refuge in the familiar taste of a hookah, which he has carried for weeks while traveling on the precarious trail from Greece to Hungary.

videoobject.name: Sleep Arrives in Open Fields
videoobject.caption: With no end to their troubles in sight, some refugee families choose to laugh their wounds and their sorrows away.
videoobject.description: With no end to their troubles in sight, some refugee families choose to laugh their wounds and their sorrows away.

videoobject.name: Children Sprayed at the Hungarian Border
videoobject.caption: As a group of Syrian refugees approached the Hungarian border, hoping to cross over from Serbia, they were met by Hungarian police who sprayed them with something that burned their eyes.
videoobject.description: As a group of Syrian refugees approached the Hungarian border, hoping to cross over from Serbia, they were met by Hungarian police who sprayed them with something that burned their eyes.

videoobject.name: The Phone Charger Situation
videoobject.caption: A group of Syrian refugees gathered around a single power strip to charge their phones.
videoobject.description: A group of Syrian refugees gathered around a single power strip to charge their phones.

videoobject.name: The Jordanian Aid Worker
videoobject.caption: A veteran aid worker finished a stint in South Sudan and then decided to tour the Balkans. He came to Belgrade, saw refugees in the parks and soon discovered Refugee Aid Serbia, a donation center.
videoobject.description: A veteran aid worker finished a stint in South Sudan and then decided to tour the Balkans. He came to Belgrade, saw refugees in the parks and soon discovered Refugee Aid Serbia, a donation center.

videoobject.name: The Drunk Man in the Park
videoobject.caption: Unaccustomed to people drinking alcohol in public, a group of Syrian refugees is bemused by a Belgrade resident who is helpful, but drunk.
videoobject.description: Unaccustomed to people drinking alcohol in public, a group of Syrian refugees is bemused by a Belgrade resident who is helpful, but drunk.

newsarticle.articlebody: “Is it O.K. to travel without a stamped paper?” asks Ahmed Hamed, 24, a refugee from Latakia, Syria. That is the question on many lips tonight here in the Serbian border town of Presevo.

metatags.og:description: Brief descriptions of each Registry title can be found here, and expanded essays are available for select titles. The authors of these essays are experts in film history, and their works appear in books, newspapers, magazines and online. Some of these essays originated in other publications and are reprinted here by permission of the author. Other essays have been written specifically for this website. The views expressed in these essays are those of the author and do not necessarily represent the views of the Library of Congress.
